about_the_game:
Note: This demo only includes the first 4 levels.

Tactical Ghost is a thrilling, realistic tactical game where you eliminate threats with precision and flair. Master your abilities for high scores and epic combos. Can you devastate your enemies with the biggest combos possible?

Mastering your abilities is crucial as you strive for high scores and your own survival. You'll need to plan your approach with care, choosing the right tactics for each situation. Behind any door could be new threats, and you must shoot and knock a door down to enter rooms. Sometimes enemies will hide behind objects, flank you, or rush you. Check your surroundings carefully before going inside. Once you have learned the layout, you can restart the mission for a better time and a better score. Get graded based on your performance and strive for the best grade of A+.

With 20 levels in total and 3 main endings, each level has multiple paths and ways to optimize your tactics. Your exact time and score are recorded for each level. At the end of the game, your scores and times are calculated for your final grade. The game is designed for multiple replays for each different ending and for the best ending grades possible.

Game Features:

  • With limited resources, plan your way to kill all of the enemies or solve the objective. With multiple ways to optimize your actions for the most score.

  • 20 levels. 3 Endings. Lots of replayabiity.

  • Smart AI: Enemies are smart in their actions and respond to how the player responds to them in real time.

  • Music: 29 songs to jam to while in and out of combat.
